thread.title: Man Utd news: Michael Carrick spots Paul Scholes comparison banner, gives it thumbs up | Metro News

author: Simon Rice For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Man Utd news: Michael Carrick spots Paul Scholes comparison banner, gives it thumbs up | Metro News
text:
Simon Rice for Metro.co.uk Monday 27 Feb 2017 1:08 pm Michael Carrick helped Manchester United to the first trophy of the season (Getty) 
Michael Carrick has shown his appreciate for a new banner which compares him to Manchester United legend Paul Scholes. 
The veteran midfielder played his role in the Red Devils winning the EFL Cup on Sunday , coming off the bench for the second half in the 3-2 victory over Southampton. 
During the game Manchester United fans unfurled a new flag showing their appreciation for Carrick and the midfield man spotted it in the stands. 
It read: ‚ÄòIt‚Äôs Carrick you know. Hard to believe it‚Äôs not Scholes‚Äô. 
Being compared to one of the club‚Äôs greatest ever midfielders went down well with Carrick. Looks üëåüèº
